question: Who has the biggest budget?
sql_query1: SELECT Civil_Engineer FROM CivilEngineers ORDER BY Budget DESC LIMIT 1;
sql_query2: SELECT Engineering_Firm FROM CivilEngineers ORDER BY Budget DESC LIMIT 1;
sql_query3: SELECT Civil_Engineer, Engineering_Firm FROM CivilEngineers ORDER BY Budget DESC LIMIT 1;
interpretation1: Which civil engineer works in the company with the biggest budget?
interpretation2: Which engineering firm has the biggest budget?
interpretation3: Which civil engineer works for the company with the biggest budget and which company is it?
sql_query_general: SELECT Designer FROM CivilEngineers ORDER BY Budget DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Who works at the intersection of Elm Street and Pine Avenue?
sql_query1: SELECT Civil_Engineer FROM CivilEngineers WHERE Intersection = 'Elm St & Pine Ave';
sql_query2: SELECT Engineering_Firm FROM CivilEngineers WHERE Intersection = 'Elm St & Pine Ave';
sql_query3: SELECT Civil_Engineer, Engineering_Firm FROM CivilEngineers WHERE Intersection = 'Elm St & Pine Ave';
interpretation1: Which civil engineer(s) work at the intersection of Elm Street and Pine Avenue?
interpretation2: What engineering firm(s) are located at the intersection of Elm Street and Pine Avenue?
interpretation3: What engineering firm(s) are located at the intersection of Elm Street and Pine Avenue, and which civil engineers work there?
sql_query_general: SELECT Designer FROM CivilEngineers WHERE Intersection = 'Elm St & Pine Ave';
